Different storyline / creat your own characters and storylines  !
1.content:
Hello everyone, my name is Sammy and I am the youngest of three boys.

My two older brothers are Tyler ( we call him Ty ) and he is an older teenager at 19 years old, Ty is always looking to do something fun either by himself or with one of us.

Next we have Cody, he is a middle teenager at 16 years old and he is always hyper and is always in the need something to sooth him down and relax him.

We all grew up poor being raised by only our father Brent and sometimes our uncle Joe.

As far back as I can remember I have always had to have something in my mouth, a binki or blanket when I was very little and then my toys when I got even older. Now I usually always have a sucker in my mouth, so my brothers thought it was funny to nickame me Sucka .

I have developed an obsession now and am always looking for new things to be put in my mouth, I started noticing my brothers soft slender toes recently and am now obesessing over them.

We all are very skinny and nerdy boys, never had many friends but we always had each other.It seems that no men and boys in our family has ever grown much body hair and we all seemed to like it that way, I was the only one who had grown my sandy blonde hair really long and Everyone always says how cute I look and I like it that way and apparently so does everyone else, I began thinking that, if everyone thinks that I am so cute then maybe I could get more to suck on ...

So one day I thought about my middle brothers soft hairless toes and wanted them in my mouth, I waited until he was showering and crept inside the bathroom and sat down on the toilet waiting for him to get out of the shower.
I didn't even think of how he would be naked and when he stepped out of the shower and my eyes went directly to his dangling suprise .... I then thought .....
1.title: Introductions

choices: Brothers plays a trick on me.
One brother is very naughty with me.
11.content:
I noticed I have what the doctors would call an Oral fixation, it doesn't matter what I have in my mouth, as long as there is something in my mouth.

That is how I got my nickname as Sucka from my brothers, I would usually have a sucker in there or a straw , It just felt right having anything in my mouth and without anything in my mouth I would get nervous and shaky.

My desire for my brothers toes and possibly more, developed that way, you see we live out in the country with No one else around and we are home schooled by our father.

Once in a while our uncle would stop by with our cousins and that's when things got really interesting .
11.title: More on my compulsion.

choices: Ty had walked in the bathroom just then.
12.content:
Right before Cody stepped out of the shower I had taken a big drink of my juice that I had gotten out of the fridge before comming up here, when I saw Cody step out naked and my eyes locking on his swinging suprize, I could not drink the juice that was in my mouth.

Cody saw my eyes and followed down to where they were locked on to, he then looked at me with my cheeks full of juice and said " Sammy you had better swallow that juice in your mouth before you choke on it " as he started drying himself off and swinging it back and forth and up and down right in front of my eyes.

It took me three gulps to swallow the juice because I was mesmerized by watching him, I didn't know what to say or do, I couldn't even stand up.

I just looked up to my brother and said " help me Cody " and I watched him step close to me .
12.title: My brother saw what I was looking at and ....

Cody led me to his room
Ty came around the corner and walked into us
Ty was spying on us and followed us quietly.
125.content:
Cody looked me in the eyes and asked me " Sammy have you ever thought about wearing girls clothes, at least wearing girls panties, I think a nice pair of panties would look wonderful on your small frame " come on buddy, I will help you back to your room or did you want to come to my room ?" .

I didn't know what to say and didn't know what to do but the image of wearing a small pair of girls pretty panties filled my mind.

Cody helped me up on my feet and headed out in the hallway, once in the hallway Cody turned and stood in front of me and asked again, " your room or mine Sammy ?"
125.title: Cody suggestions

choices: Cody stops back at your room.
They both met at your room.
Your father Brent walked in and saw what you were doing.
13.content:
I thought I have to stop looking at him and get back to my room, I shyly looked up to my brother and smiled saying " sorry big brother I will leave now " and then I caught myself looking back down at him again before running back to my room.

I was sitting in my bedroom bored, the sucker in my mouth was just about finished and it was my last one, I thought ' how could I not have known that I had no more sucker at home ? I guess I will have to find something else to suck on' so I brought up my soft hairless toes to my mouth and began sucking on them but it just wasn't doing the job so I reached across on my end table and grabbed my brush and stuffed the handle in my mouth.

I almost chocked, I had not realized that the handle was so wide, so I slowly pulled the brush out most of the way and then slid it back in, better I thought and repeated it over and over.

Unbeknownst to me my brother Cody was watching me through a crack in my door and was recording it on his phone.
After a while Cody got enough recorded and slipped away without me even knowing that he was there.

Cody found his brother in the kitchen and rushed over and showed him the video and both of them looked at each other and laughed but behind their laughs, they both had a different feeling that they would not say and each boy quickly went out of the likchen and pretended to go back to their own rooms.
13.title: Getting caught

15.content: HERE ARE SOME OPEN SLOTS FOR YOUR OWN CREATIVE SIDE …...
15.title: Different storyline / creat your own characters...

info.description:
Being the youngest of three boys, you have developed a compulsive disorder to suck on things, from infancy to present day, You have an overwhelming desire for something in your mouth.


Age of You ... the main character can either be described by the writer of that thread or you may leave the age of your character out and just imagine your characters age.

There will be no vore of any kind, no toilet related stuff and no size changing.

You are encouraged to involve Incest between the brothers and possibly more family members, try to always have something in Sammy's mouth, it can be something innocent or something very naughty. This story can also have some dog licking if you wish .

Have fun with the story, so nothing involving being beat up , although making Sammy a sissy later in the story is very encouraged and hope it gets a lot of detail with it !
